recipes.name: pannekoekenmix
instructions: In a mixing bowl, combine flour and salt.
In another bowl, whisk together eggs, milk, and melted butter.
Gradually add the wet ingredients to the dry ingredients, stirring until smooth.
Heat a non-stick skillet over medium heat and lightly grease with butter or oil.
Pour a small amount of batter into the skillet and tilt to spread evenly.
Cook until bubbles form on the surface, then flip and cook the other side until golden brown.
Repeat with the remaining batter.
Serve warm with your favorite toppings.

recipes.name: pasta
instructions: Cook pasta according to package instructions until al dente. Drain and set aside.
In a saucepan, heat marinara sauce over medium heat until warmed through.
Add cooked pasta to the saucepan and toss to coat.
Season with salt and pepper to taste.
Divide pasta among serving plates and sprinkle with grated Parmesan cheese and chopped basil.
Serve hot and enjoy!

recipes.name: stir-fry
ingredients: 2 cups mixed vegetables (bell peppers, broccoli, carrots, snap peas, etc.)
1 lb boneless chicken breast, sliced thinly
instructions: In a small bowl, mix together soy sauce and oyster sauce. Set aside.
Heat vegetable oil in a large skillet or wok over high heat.
Add minced garlic and ginger, saut√© for 30 seconds until fragrant.
Add sliced chicken breast to the skillet and cook until no longer pink.
Add mixed vegetables to the skillet and stir-fry for 3-4 minutes until crisp-tender.
Pour the soy sauce mixture over the chicken and vegetables. Stir well to combine.
Continue cooking for another 2-3 minutes until the sauce thickens slightly.
Remove from heat and serve hot over cooked rice.

recipes.name: grilled cheese sandwich
instructions: Preheat a skillet or griddle over medium heat.
Spread butter evenly on one side of each slice of bread.
Place two slices of bread, buttered side down, onto the skillet.
Top each slice of bread with 2 slices of cheddar cheese.
Place the remaining slices of bread on top, buttered side facing up.
Cook for 3-4 minutes until the bottom is golden brown and the cheese starts to melt.
Carefully flip the sandwiches and cook for another 3-4 minutes until the other side is golden brown and the cheese is completely melted.
Remove from heat and serve immediately.
